Question: In the late 1950s, this person applied at a local Methodist church to lead a Boy Scout troop.
Hints: In the entire Apollo 11 photographic record, there are only five images of this person partly shown or reflected.
At the bottom of the ladder, this person said "I'm going to step off the LEM now" (referring to the Apollo Lunar Module).
In May 2005, this person became involved in an unusual legal battle with his barber of 20 years, Marx Sizemore.
